title: Formula Truck Simulator 2013
description:
Developed by Reiza Studios for Windows PC, Formula Truck Simulator simulates Formula Truck's 2013 season and includes 26 race trucks and drivers, plus 14 minutely detailed race tracks for a total of 18 different layouts. The player is able to set up his truck by adjusting suspension, drivetrain, brakes and tires in order to reach the best performance.


Features
- Simulates Formula TruckÃ‚Â´s 2013 season 
- 26 race trucks and drivers 
- 14 minutely detailed race tracks for a total of 18 different layouts

Technical sophistication 
The player is able to set up his truck by adjusting suspension, drivetrain, brakes and tires in order to reach the best performance.

High Realism 
Developed with support from professional teams and drivers into a sophisticated racing simulator.

Technology 
Combines the best graphical and audio features with an advanced driving model to provide an unique and immersive driving experience.

Game Modes 
Practice, Single Player race, full championship, Multiplayer.

Customizable 
Offers several difficulty levels and driving aids, softening the learning curve for newcomers.

Minimum Configuration
- 1.4 Ghz Processor
- Windows XP or superior
- 1GB RAM
- Directx 9.0c compatible video card with 128MB Video RAM
- 4 GB free hard disk space
- Internet connection for online activation

Recommended configuration
- 2.8 Ghz Processor
- Windows XP or superior
- 3GB RAM
- Directx 9.0c compatible video card with 512MB Video RAM
- 4 GB free hard disk space
- Internet connection for online activation
